t: Amazon China - Wikipedia
s: December 24, 2024 - Amazon China (Chinese: 亚马逊中国), formerly known as Joyo.com (Chinese: 卓越网), is an online shopping website. Joyo.com was founded in early 2000 by the Chinese entrepreneur Lei Jun in Beijing, China. The company primarily sold books and other media goods, shipping to customers nationwide.

t: Why does amazon allow chinese sellers that ship from china
s: They are actively recruiting China based sellers at the rate of 230,000 per year (not my data). They need to build the number of sellers from China so when the Amazon Cargo Ship is ready it will be a smooth transition and fully loaded on the first departure.

t: Chinese ship Xi'an - Wikipedia
s: October 10, 2022 - A number of vessels of the People's Liberation Army Navy have borne the name Xi'an, after the capital Xi'an. t: Amazon To Launch a Direct-From-China Marketplace - Marketplace Pulse
s: June 27, 2024 - Amazon will launch a Temu, Shein, and AliExpress competitor featuring low-price items shipped directly from China. Amazon's main quest remains Prime, but it has accepted a new side quest.

t: Amazon pushing hard into ocean shipping, making it easier for Chinese goods to get to you
s: January 18, 2019 - Amazon has ramped up its ocean shipping service, as of this week sending close to 4.7 million cartons of consumers goods from China to the U.S.
